data.lyric:
[ti:We Were (Acoustic Version)]
[ar:Keith Urban]
[al:We Were (Acoustic Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]We Were (Acoustic) - Keith Urban (凯斯.厄本)
[00:05.05]Mmm baby now
[00:11.90]We were just a couple years short of the age
[00:15.08]By my name on a fake ID
[00:17.95]And still 'bout a hundred away from the day
[00:21.21]Your daddy said you could run with me
[00:23.99]We were a couple of line steppers
[00:26.65]Who just couldn't wait to step over the line
[00:30.27]Never thinkin' we wouldn't last
[00:33.06]I was your first and you were mine
[00:36.12]And we were leather jackets hangin' onto a Harley
[00:39.51]Two heartbeats in the moonlight
[00:43.14]Both feet hangin' out over the edge
[00:45.44]Of the water tower skyline
[00:48.95]At least there's a little bit of sweet in the bitter
[00:51.65]Though a part of me is always gonna miss her
[00:54.68]I am who I am I just miss who I was when we were
[01:06.74]Mm-hmm
[01:12.58]We were gonna make it weren't we baby
[01:15.70]We had it all laid out in our mind
[01:18.73]By the time we knew time was runnin' out
[01:21.72]We'd done run out of time
[01:24.47]We were downtown Saturday night last-call cover band
[01:30.65]'Til the last song played never thought we'd fade
[01:33.61]Like the stamp on the back of her hand
[01:36.60]We were her on my shoulders lighter in the air
[01:40.00]Pour Some Sugar On Me
[01:42.52]We were a top down at Johnson's field
[01:45.79]When she whispered that she wants me
[01:48.93]At least there's a little bit of sweet in the bitter
[01:51.72]Though a part of me is always gonna miss her
[01:54.64]I am who I am I just miss who I was when we were
[02:03.47]Ooh yeah
[02:06.61]Oh yes
[02:10.02]Oh mm-hmm
[02:12.23]We were leather jackets hangin' onto a Harley
[02:15.60]Two heartbeats in the moonlight
[02:19.36]Both feet hangin' out over the edge of the water tower skyline
[02:24.69]At least there's a little bit of sweet in the bitter
[02:27.77]Though a part of me is always gonna miss her
[02:30.53]I am who I am but I just miss who I was when we were
[02:41.57]Mmm yes I do
[02:48.05]My friends say
[02:49.49]Oh well let that ship sail
[02:51.89]You gotta let go of her
[02:54.73]Just wasn't meant to be
[02:56.17]But somewhere down deep I still believe
[03:00.08]That we were
data.trans:
[ti:We Were (Acoustic Version)]
[ar:Keith Urban]
[al:We Were (Acoustic Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.05]宝贝
[00:11.90]我们仅仅相差几岁
[00:15.08]看假身份证的话
[00:17.95]离那天还有好久
[00:21.21]你爸爸就准你同我外出了
[00:23.99]我们都是直言不讳的人
[00:26.65]都迫不及待的打破界限
[00:30.27]从未想过我们会分手
[00:33.06]我是你的初恋 你是我的唯一
[00:36.12]我们就像皮衣和摩托一样般配
[00:39.51]月光下两颗悸动的心 彼此心照不宣
[00:43.14]我们在边缘游走
[00:45.44]在水天一线徘徊
[00:48.95]至少苦涩中尚有这一丝甜蜜的慰藉
[00:51.65]尽管我不免常常想起她
[00:54.68]我还是那个我 还是那个对她念念不忘的我
[01:06.74]//
[01:12.58]我们会好起来的 不是吗 宝贝
[01:15.70]一切都牢牢刻在我心里
[01:18.73]随着时间的流逝 我们都知道时间紧迫
[01:21.72]我们没有多少时间浪费
[01:24.47]周六晚上我们在市中心 看翻唱乐队当晚最后的演出
[01:30.65]直到曲终人散 谁又曾想过我们的感情也会消逝
[01:33.61]像你手背上的印记 最终淡去
[01:36.60]过去她靠在我肩上 爱火在空气中燃烧
[01:40.00]给我些抚慰 给我些甜蜜吧
[01:42.52]我们在约翰逊地区欢闹
[01:45.79]她对我耳语 诉说浓浓爱意
[01:48.93]至少苦涩中尚有这一丝甜蜜的慰藉
[01:51.72]尽管我不免常常想起她
[01:54.64]我还是那个我 还是那个对她念念不忘的我
[02:03.47]//
[02:06.61]//
[02:10.02]//
[02:12.23]我们就像皮衣和摩托一样般配
[02:15.60]月光下两颗悸动的心 彼此心照不宣
[02:19.36]我们在边缘游走 在水天一线徘徊
[02:24.69]至少苦涩中尚有这一丝甜蜜的慰藉
[02:27.77]尽管我不免常常想起她
[02:30.53]我还是那个我 还是那个对她念念不忘的我
[02:41.57]是呀 我想念着
[02:48.05]朋友们说
[02:49.49]哦 打起精神 重新出发吧
[02:51.89]你该放下和她的过往了
[02:54.73]也许不是命中注定
[02:56.17]但内心深处我仍然相信
[03:00.08]我们过去的美好
